name: Rancho Relaxo
description:
Welcome to RANCHO RELAXO

A relaxing Game Strip game

Buy Seeds from the shop, plant them on your farm

Relax and watch them Grow over the course of a few hours

*Game Speed increased for the Game Jam

Crop Growth should take a few hours

Gx.Games link: https://gx.games/games/lcvi3s/rancho-relaxo/tracks/684c614e-d7aa-47d6-a9b3-21e7f...
